Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: I'mAcHildoFgoD
Reviews.Content: I bought it for my daughter for Christmas,  Shows clear pictures Nice size and shipped on time.She and I love It!

Reviews.Title: Not Happy
Reviews.Author: cherbear
Reviews.Content: When my grand daughter opened the gift, she was thrilled.That evening when they went home to plug it in so she could watch it the entired screen was in pink and purple.We have yet to report this problem to Amazon because they were not available Christmas evening, we will be contacting them tomorrow.

ProductInfo.Features:
Multi Purpose - Use as standard TV or as PC monitor simply by selecting input source
HD Ready, 1366 x 768 Resolution (720p)
Screen Size - 18.5 (measured diagonally)
ATSC Integrated Tuner
Inputs - Cable/Antenna, CVBS, YPbPr, HDMI, VGA, PC Audio, Coaxial, USB
ProductInfo.Name: Hello Kitty 19" LCD Television/PC Monitor with Remote Control - KT2219
